data.title: The Humane Society for Tacoma & Pierce County
data.meta_site_name: The Humane Society for Tacoma & Pierce County
data.text:
Join us for “Clear The Shelters” and help pets find loving homes! From August 16 to September 5, adopt an adult dog for $50, an adult cat for $25, or a small critter for $5.

During the nationwide campaign last year, 146 pets found new families. With your support, we can create even more happily ever afters this year!

Join us in celebrating the Humane Society for Tacoma & Pierce County’s fifth annual Day of Giving! This annual celebration highlights our commitment to saving pets’ lives and supporting the people who love them.

Thanks to our generous friends at Petco Love, every donation will be QUADRUPLED up to $90,000! That means 4X the medical care, food, and comfort for pets in need.

Make your donation by midnight on August 22 to help us Make Happy Happen for dogs, cats, and critters. Together, we can make a difference in the lives of thousands of pets each year.

August is National Make-A-Will Month, the perfect time to ensure your loved ones, both two- and four-legged, are cared for.

Create your will with FreeWill—a free and easy resource used by over a million people.

Join the pack and make a life-saving difference for 10,000 pets and the people who love them each year, all at no immediate cost.
